definition: a person whom one knows and has a bond of mutual affection
sentence: She is my best friend since childhood.

definition: having a refined knowledge of the world
sentence: Her sophisticated taste in art impressed everyone.

definition: too great or extreme to be expressed in words
sentence: The beauty of the landscape was ineffable.

definition: essentially different in kind; not allowing comparison
sentence: The two cultures were so disparate that they could hardly understand each other.

definition: Weak or faint from illness or fatigue.
sentence: After the long hike, she felt languid and needed to rest.

definition: Extremely delicate and light in a way that seems too perfect for this world.
sentence: The dancer moved with an ethereal grace that captivated the audience.

definition: A solution or remedy for all difficulties or diseases.
sentence: Many believe that technology is a panacea for all modern problems.

definition: Optimistic or positive, especially in an apparently bad or difficult situation.
sentence: Despite the setbacks, she remained sanguine about the future.

definition: A person who dislikes humankind and avoids human society.
sentence: The misanthrope spent most of his time alone, shunning social gatherings.

definition: Kept secret, especially because it would not be approved of.
sentence: They exchanged surreptitious glances during the meeting.
